Clip.Title: HELL'S MINER OF POTOSI
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the Potosi mountains in Bolivia, Cerro Rico is know as the highest and most dangerous silver mines in the world. Here miner Eduardo risks his life daily, but dreams of a better future.

Clip.Title: LAMALERA, THE ULTIMATE BATTLE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: In the remote village of Lamalera, people have survived by the age-old method of harpooning sperm whales, but as the whales are dying out, some want to embrace modernity by fishing with motors, while others fear the death of their traditions, leading to serious conflict.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the port city of Halifax, to the historic Acadian shores and international waters beyond, this aerial exploration documents the treasures and mysteries of Nova Scotia's Southern coast.

Clip.Title: DESIGN BY DECADE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The transformative swinging 1960's were magical times in Canada with events such as Expo 67 in Montreal . This was a a celebratory era in Canada with design reaching new heights and innovators leaving their mark.

Clip.Title: CITY GUIDES
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Follow our City Guide as she takes us around the multicultural and art-centric neighbourhood called the Grange. Some of the sights include the Art Gallery of Ontario and OCAD.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Bella Coola to Prince Rupert, this aerial journey encounters some of British Columbia's most remote settlements and stunning, inland mountain ranges.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: RITES OF PASSAGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Exploring birth, death, coming of age and marriage through different cultural and religious perspectives.

Clip.Title: CANADA: OVER THE EDGE
Clip.EpisodeSummary: An aerial survey of world famous Cape Breton Island reveals why this has been called the "world's greatest road trip" - from the Canso Causeway to the Cape Breton Highlands - the island is a world unto its own.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From Val Chisone to Racconigi, see Medieval fortresses, abbeys and parks of ancient nobility between Val di Susa and Turin.

Clip.Title: MAGNIFICA ITALIA
Clip.Episode: From the Langhe to Lake Maggiore
Clip.EpisodeSummary: From the Langhe to Lake Maggiore we continue our journey along a charming territory with many attractions: beautiful santuaries and precious wines tastings with the imposing Fenestrelle fortress in the background and the Rivoli Castle announcing Turin, once capital of the Kingdom of Italy.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: HUBBLE'S CANVAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Peer into the farthest reaches of our galaxy via the famous space telescope.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: The Northern Lights are more than just beautiful. They tell us about the make up of our planet, our sun, and may even be a signpost for the possibility of life on other planets.

Clip.Title: COSMIC VISTAS
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Our understanding of the cosmos is limited not only but what we can see, but by the amount of time we have to see it. Fortunately computer simulations are helping us see what it's like to fly over other worlds and how galaxies interact over millions of years.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: QUEST
Clip.Episode: Playing Back Old Records, Archival Photos & Preserved Animal Research
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Covering developments in astronomy, biology, chemistry, engineering, the environment, geology, health, physics and the weather, Quest delves deep into subject matter that is often inaccesible to the public, to satisfy your curiousity and to illuminate the wonders of contemporary science and research.

Clip.Title: DENYING THE MOON LANDING
Clip.EpisodeSummary: Apollo astronauts and scientific experts reflect on NASA's glorious achievement, and the shock of having their accomplishments questioned 40 years later.
